text: Specialized shop for calligraphy needs. I was looking for rolled washi paper at specific size, and the staff was very helpful. Truly amazing shop. Great service.
I came to know about this shop after watching the CNA docu "An Unfinished Portrait: Bras Basah Complex" --> very heartwarming show _

No need to look further if you want to buy calligraphy and painting supplies. Advices are on top, my only regret is that I had very little time to scout the shop which is choke full of wonders.  感谢你的存在🙏🏻
A friend introduced me to this shop, and I had a great time learning about brushes from the kind shop staff. They have a range of products for calligraphy, painting and more!

Long time customer; the staff are very friendly and knowledgeable about different supplies. They let you sample brushes before buying very patiently.

If you aren't picky, they have a discount bin for slightly defected paints or other misc art supplies.

Would highly recommend shopping here for Chinese art supplies over ArtFr13nd for lower prices and better products.
